auth.loginInstruction: Enter your email to receive a magic link for logging in.
auth.checkEmail: Check your email for a login link!
auth.redirectMessage: Please log in to continue to your requested page.
auth.keycloakError: Failed to login with Keycloak. Please try again.
auth.pleaseWait: Please wait while we sign you in...

clubs.configureFeatures: Configure which features are enabled for your club.
clubs.finesDescription: Allow club admins to create and manage fines for members.
clubs.shiftsDescription: Enable shift scheduling and management for club events.
clubs.teamsDescription: Allow club admins to create and manage teams with their members.
clubs.membersListDescription: Allow regular members to view the club member list
clubs.discoverableDescription: Allow users who are not members to find and view basic information about this club
clubs.publicPreview: This is a public preview of {{clubName}}. To see more details and join this club, please request access.
clubs.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete "{{clubName}}"? This will mark the club as deleted and make it invisible to all members except owners.
clubs.hardDeleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to permanently delete "{{clubName}}"? This action cannot be undone and will permanently remove the club and all its data.
clubs.hardDeleteError: Error permanently deleting club. Please try again.
clubs.clubDeleted: This club has been marked as deleted and is only visible to owners.
clubs.noLongerMember: You are no longer a member of this club
clubs.invalidLink: The link you used is invalid or expired
clubs.temporaryIssue: There might be a temporary issue with the server

teams.title: Teams
teams.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this team?
teams.removeMemberConfirmation: Are you sure you want to remove this member from the team?
teams.noAvailableMembers: All club members are already in this team

fines.noTemplates: No fine templates found. Add one to get started!
fines.validationError: Please provide a valid description and amount
fines.deleteConfirmation: Are you sure you want to delete this fine template?

preferences.title: Preferences
preferences.themeDescription: Pick a theme to customize the appearance.
preferences.systemSettingDescription: Automatically switch based on your device settings

notifications.title: Notification Settings
notifications.description: Choose how you want to be notified about activities in your clubs.

memberAdded.title: Member Added
memberAdded.description: When you are added to a club

eventCreated.title: Event Created
eventCreated.description: When new events are created in your clubs

fineAssigned.title: Fine Assigned
fineAssigned.description: When you are assigned a fine

newsCreated.title: News Created
newsCreated.description: When news is published in your clubs

messages.saveError: Failed to save settings. Please try again.

notifications.note: In-app notifications appear in the notification bell icon. Email notifications are sent to your registered email address.
